Text: I saw this movie some years ago and found it hard to digest - will give it a second go now, thanks!

Thanx for the upload, but the video quality seems poor. Can't tell why... Like a bad dvd rip and under my opinion it doesn't worth the download if u intent to save the copy. The movie is really great though!
Oops.... I didn't read the uploaders note. Sorry for that. For a VHS rip this is great work man! Thanx!

Move is definitely worth the download.  I think it's available on region 4 DVD, but have never seen a region 1 and doubt that it exists.

Worth seeing in any format, however - I had the treat of seeing it in a theatre (although a print with french subtitles) and it looks amazing on the big screen....great torrent!

Thanks for uploading and to those seeding.
Player used to watch the movie - KMPlayer
the video of the print is moved to the left of the screen. could not find matching subtitles for the print.
